TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner

summary.span: 在设计器宿主中为 控件提供设计时支持。

span.span: Provides design-time support in a designer host for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在设计器宿主中, 当用户从源切换到设计视图时, 将分析描述派生自抽象类的控件的标记源代码, 并在设计图面上创建该控件的设计时版本。In a designer host, when the user switches from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes a control that is derived from the abstract class is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface. 当用户切换回源视图时, 设计时控件将保存到标记源代码, 并将其编辑到网页的标记中。When the user switches back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page. 类为从设计器宿主中的派生的控件提供设计时支持。 The class provides design-time support for controls that are derived from the in a designer host. 类属性提供了以下功能:The class properties provide the following functionality: - 属性返回一个对象, 该对象通常包含一个对象, 该对象是从设计器的继承树中的每个级别派生的。 The property returns a object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer. - 属性提供对数据源设计器的访问 (如果已定义)。The property provides access to the designer of the data source, if one is defined. - 属性获取绑定到关联控件的数据源的默认视图。The property gets the default view of the data source that is bound to the associated control. - 属性确定控件是否应呈现其用于选择和创建数据源的默认操作列表。The property determines whether the control should render its default action lists for choosing and creating data sources. 类方法提供了以下功能:The class methods provide the following functionality: - 方法执行连接到当前数据源所必需的操作。The method performs the actions that are necessary to connect to the current data source. - 方法为关联的控件创建新的数据源。The method creates a new data source for the associated control. - 方法将派生自类的关联控件绑定到设计时数据源。 The method binds the associated control that is derived from the class to a design-time data source. - 方法执行与当前数据源断开连接所需的操作。The method performs the actions that are necessary to disconnect from the current data source. - 方法获取可在设计时用于关联控件的数据源。The method gets a data source that can be used at design time for the associated control. - 方法构造一个可在设计时用于关联控件的示例数据源。The method constructs a sample data source that can be used at design time for the associated control. - 方法用于从类中移除属性或向其添加其他属性, 或者隐藏派生自类的关联控件的属性。 The method is used to remove properties from or add additional properties to or to shadow properties of the associated control that is derived from the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何扩展类, 以便在设计时更改从控件派生的控件的外观。The following code example shows how to extend the class to change the appearance of controls that are derived from the control at design time. 该示例`MyHierarchicalDataBoundControl` 从派生类。The example derives the `MyHierarchicalDataBoundControl` class from the . 类只是的副本。 `MyHierarchicalDataBoundControl`The `MyHierarchicalDataBoundControl` class is simply a copy of the . 该示例还从类`MyHierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner`派生类, 并在`MyHierarchicalDataBoundControl`类上放置的`MyHierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner`对象。The example also derives the `MyHierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner` class from the class and places a object for the `MyHierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner` on the `MyHierarchicalDataBoundControl` class. 重写方法, 使属性在设计时在 "属性" 网格中可见。 `MyHierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner` The `MyHierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner` overrides the method to make the property visible in the **Properties** grid at design time. 它会重写方法, 以便在设计时标记为`null`或时生成占位符的标记, 或在设计时标记为空``块的情况下 (即, 如果在``It overrides the method to generate the markup for a placeholder if the design time markup is `null` or , or if the design-time markup is an empty `` block (that is, if there is no inner markup between the `` 和``标记)。and `` tags). [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner/CS/hierarchicaldatabounddesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner/VB/hierarchicaldatabounddesigner.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 在创建类的新实例时, 它会在设计图面上创建派生自类的关联控件或该控件的副本。The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the class when it creates the associated control that is derived from the class or a copy of that control on the design surface.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property ActionLists As DesignerActionListCollection

summary.span: 获取此设计器的设计器操作列表集合。

span.span: Gets the designer action list collection for this designer.
The associated with this designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性创建一个空对象。 The property creates an empty object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance bool ConnectToDataSource() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function ConnectToDataSource () As Boolean

summary.span: 执行与当前数据源连接所必要的操作。

span.span: Performs the actions that are necessary to connect to the current data source.

returns.span: 如果执行了与新数据源的连接，则为 ；如果新旧数据源相同，则为 。

span.span: if a connection to a new data source was performed; if the old and new data source are the same.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将与以前的数据源中的和事件断开连接, 然后将这些事件附加到新的数据源。 The method disconnects the and events from the previous data source, and then attaches these events to the new data source.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void CreateDataSource() cil managed

summary.span: 创建关联控件的新数据源。

span.span: Creates a new data source for the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法会显示一个对话框, 可以使用该对话框为从类派生的关联控件创建数据源。 The method displays a dialog box that can be used to create a data source for the associated control that is derived from the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void DataBind(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl dataBoundControl) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub DataBind (dataBoundControl As BaseDataBoundControl)

param.name: dataBoundControl
param.span: 要绑定到设计时数据源的 控件。

span.span: The to bind to the design-time data source.

summary.span: 将关联控件绑定到设计时数据源。

span.span: Binds the associated control to the design-time data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `null` 方法首先将控件的 属性设置为引用设计时数据源, 并将属性设置为。 The method first sets the property of the control to reference the design-time data source and sets the property to `null`. 回调从类派生的控件的方法,以绑定到设计时数据源。The calls back to the method of the control that is derived from the class to bind to the design-time data source. 最后, 还原和属性的原始值。Finally, it restores the original values of the and properties. 参数是从与此设计器关联的类或该控件的副本派生的控件。 `dataBoundControl`The `dataBoundControl` parameter is the control that is derived from the class that is associated with this designer, or a copy of that control.

span.span: The designer for the data source of the associated control derived from the , which implements the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用设计器的属性或派生自类的关联控件的属性来访问数据源。The data source can be accessed using the property of the designer or the property of the associated control that is derived from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用设计器的属性或派生自类的关联控件的属性来访问数据源。The data source can be accessed using the property of the designer or the property of the associated control that is derived from the class.

span.span: Performs the actions that are necessary to disconnect from the current data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法断开与当前数据源的和事件的连接。 The method disconnects the and events from the current data source.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable GetDesignTimeDataSource() cil managed
Protected Overridable Function GetDesignTimeDataSource () As IHierarchicalEnumerable
abstract member GetDesignTimeDataSource : unit -> System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable override this.GetDesignTimeDataSource : unit -> System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable

summary.span: 获取一个设计时使用的关联控件的数据源。

span.span: Gets a data source that can be used at design time for the associated control.

returns.span: 实现 接口的对象，可用作 派生的控件的数据源。

span.span: An object implementing the interface that can be used as a data source for controls derived from the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 出于性能原因, 最好在设计时使用简单的预定义数据源, 而不是从类派生的控件的实际数据源。For performance reasons, it is better to use a simple predefined data source at design time rather than the actual data source for the control that is derived from the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable GetSampleDataSource() cil managed
Protected Overridable Function GetSampleDataSource () As IHierarchicalEnumerable
abstract member GetSampleDataSource : unit -> System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable override this.GetSampleDataSource : unit -> System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable

summary.span: 构造可在设计时用于关联控件的示例数据源。

span.span: Constructs a sample data source that can be used at design time for the associated control.

returns.span: 实现 接口的对象，可用作 派生的控件的数据源。

span.span: An object implementing the interface that can be used as a data source for controls derived from .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法构造的示例数据具有一个具有空路径的节点。The sample data constructed by the method has a single node with an empty path.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterProperties(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PreFilterProperties (properties As IDictionary)

param.name: properties
param.span: 实现添加的和隐藏的属性的 的集合。

span.span: A collection implementing the of the added and shadowed properties.

summary.span: 供设计器使用，以从“属性”网格的显示中移除属性或向其添加其他属性或者隐藏关联控件的属性。

span.span: Used by the designer to remove properties from or add additional properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件设计器使用从方法派生的方法, 用设计器实现的相应设计时属性隐藏各种控件属性, 并向**属性中添加属性或从中移除属性**网格。Control designers use methods that are derived from the method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the **Properties** grid. 对于从类派生的控件 , 方法创建用于隐藏和属性的设计时属性。For controls that are derived from the class, the method creates design-time properties to shadow the and properties. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在从类继承的类中重写方法, 以便在设计时更改 控件的属性网格。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the **Properties** grid of the control at design time. 该示例使属性在**属性**网格中可见。The example makes the property visible in the **Properties** grid. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner/CS/hierarchicaldatabounddesigner.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner/VB/hierarchicaldatabounddesigner.vb#3)]

para.span: 重写方法, 以便在设计时属性集合中将属性添加到属性或更改属性的属性。

span.span: Override the method to add properties to or change the attributes of properties in the design-time property collection.

para.span: 请确保在执行其他处理之前调用基方法。

span.span: Be sure to call the base method before performing other processing.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overridable ReadOnly Property UseDataSourcePickerActionList As Boolean
protected: virtual property bool UseDataSourcePickerActionList { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示控件是否应呈现其默认操作列表，该操作列表包含一个数据源 ID 下拉列表和相关任务。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should render its default action lists, which contain a data source ID drop-down list and related tasks.
Always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类的默认操作列表包括 "**选择数据源**" 菜单项, 该菜单项具有可从中选择数据源的下拉列表, 以及数据源控件的操作列表中的任何其他操作项。The default action lists for the class include a **Choose Data Source** menu item that has a drop-down list from which a data source can be selected, and any other action items on the action lists of the data source control. 通常, 数据源控件操作列表将包括 "**配置数据源**" 和 "**刷新架构**" 菜单项, 但这些项不一定总是存在。Typically, the data source control action lists will include **Configure Data Source** and **Refresh Schema** menu items, although these need not always be present. "**配置数据源**" 菜单项将显示一个适用于所选数据源类型的对话框。The **Configure Data Source** menu item displays a dialog box that is appropriate to the type of data source chosen. 例如, 如果数据源是控件, 则 "**配置数据源**" 对话框允许您为选择业务对象。For example, if the data source is an control, the **Configure Data Source** dialog box allows you to choose a business object for the . "**刷新架构**" 菜单项可刷新数据源应用的设计器架构。The **Refresh Schema** menu item refreshes the designer schema that is applied by the data source.

para.span: 如果你不希望显示默认的数据源操作列表项, 请重写属性以返回。

span.span: If you do not want the default data source action list items to be displayed, override the property to return .

para.span: 如果希望显示其他数据源操作列表项 , 请重写以返回并重写属性, 以便将相应的对象添加到它返回的对象。

span.span: If you want other data source action list items to be displayed, override the to return and override the property to add the appropriate objects to the object that it returns.
